price: 126. Y Al-lah hizo que (ese refuerzo) fuese una buena noticia para animarlos y tranquilizar sus corazones. Y la victoria proviene solo de Al-lah, el Poderoso, el Sabio.
arabic: وَمَا جَعَلَهُ ٱللَّهُ إِلَّا بُشۡرَىٰ لَكُمۡ وَلِتَطۡمَئِنَّ قُلُوبُكُم بِهِۦۗ وَمَا ٱلنَّصۡرُ إِلَّا مِنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَكِيمِ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wamā jaʿalahu al-lahu illā bush'rā lakum walitaṭma-inna qulūbukum bihi wamā al-naṣru illā min ʿindi al-lahi al-ʿazīzi al-ḥakīmi
